name: Stargloss Shine Hair Gloss Treatment
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Masks
about: What it is: A prewash glossing treatment that delivers brilliant shine, reduces frizz and smooths & hydrates hair...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Frizz.- Shine.- Straightening and Smoothing..Key Benefits:.- Adds dazzling shine.- Creates silky-smoothness & tames frizz.- Boosts hydration..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Prickly Pear Seed Oil: Fatty acids condition strands to be silky, soft, and shiny..- Moringa Seed Oil: Vitamins and antioxidants boost keratin and restore moisture..- Shea Butter: Moisturizes hair, tames frizz, and repairs damage...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This shine booster is made to be used as a prewash treatment to deliver smooth, shiny hair. It is infused with prickly pear seed oil and tames frizz, nourishes, and hydrates...Fragrance Description: This treatment has crisp, fruity notes of prickly pear, mandarin, and magnoliau2014the aroma of desert romance in full bloom. A maples journey through miles of cacti adorned with fresh flowers of every hue. A collection of moments that make you feel forever free....
ingredients: -Prickly Pear Seed Oil: Fatty acids condition strands to be silky, soft, and shiny..-Moringa Seed Oil: Vitamins and antioxidants boost keratin and restore moisture..-Shea Butter: Moisturizes hair, tames frizz, and repairs damage...Water/Aqua, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, Polyglyceryl-10 Decaoleate, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Stearyl Alcohol, Castor Oil Propanediol Esters, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Limonene, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Linalool, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Citral, Geraniol, Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491)......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use on unwashed dry hair..-Part hair into two-inch sections..-Using applicator tip, apply generous amount from mid-lengths to ends..-Work into each section with fingertips..-Leave on for 20 minutes (can leave on overnight)..-Rinse out, then wash with your favorite dae shampoo and conditioner..-Style as usual and shine on....Oh, and expect a little magic! Glitter appears in the goop + on hair when you apply it. It washes right out though u2013 simply wash your hair as you usually would with shampoo + conditioner and it instantly disappears!

reviews.review_text: I was gifted this Dae Hair Stargloss Shine Hair Gloss Treatment complimentary from Dae Hair, to get to try this glossing treatment and leave my honest review. It is great for Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily hair and all hair thickness. u2b50ufe0f  What is it good for? This gloss treatment boosts hydration, adds shine, creates silky-smoothness and tames frizz. is infused with prickly pear seed oil and tames frizz, nourishes, and hydrates. u2b50ufe0f  This treatment has crisp, fruity notes of prickly pear, mandarin, and magnolia. It smells very sweet but wonderful! I am usually more of a clean, sea or vanilla scent girl. But there is just something about the fragrance of this gloss treatment that has me hooked! I literally kept smelling my hands during application. u2b50ufe0f  This treatment is to be applied to dry hair prior to washing. You can leave it on for 20 minutes or overnight. Once the time is up, shampoo, condition and style as usual for beautiful, shiny, hydrated tresses. u2b50ufe0f  I have very dry, dull, thick, wavy hair. So I left Stargloss on overnight and washed out the next afternoon. My blonde highlighted hair is so shiny, soft and feels silky smooth! My ends that always look so ratty, actually look and feel like what I envision normal healthy hair to be like. I really enjoyed using this gloss treatment and seeing my results. Stargloss is definitely going to be added into my hair care routine atleast once a week. Thank you Dae Hair! u2b50ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: *gifted by Dae Hair* Dae products work great for my fine hair and this one is no exception. I love that it is applied to dry hair before washing as opposed to applying to damp hair, because I find the second option inconvenient. It is easy to apply to the hair and it smells so good! Afterwards I washed my hair as I usually do and my hair was extremely soft and silky. I didnt even need to use leave in products. My hair stayed soft, silky and detangled.

reviews.review_title: A must have for dry and dull hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product that I didnt know I needed! I always have dry ends so I am always looking for products that make my hair shiny and more hydrated. This glossy treatment does just that! I apply it on dry hair, coating all the hair from mids to ends, and let it sit for a few hours before washing it (sometimes I even do it overnight but it also works in 20 minutes as well), then wash as normal and when my hair is dry and styled, it has the most beautiful shine. It does not feel heavy and leaves my hair with lots of movement. Such a unique product that has already become a favorite and it's made the weekly rotation. Highly recommend! I received this product complimentary from Dae Hair but this is my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so fun!!! The glitter when applying made the application process so fun. I left it sitting in for about 40 minutes before washing and then let my hair dry overnight- my hair is feeling shiny and glittery today! Absolutely love this. Gifted by Dae hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Im not going to lie this product made my hair feel so soft and less frizzy. I honestly struggle with dry hair from dying it a lot and I also have super straight hair and this hair mask has really helped keep my hair stay hydrated and healthy. I let it sit in my hair for 15 minutes before washing it out and my hair was so soft and shiny after. This a pic of after ive used the hair mask!! complimentary from Dae Hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product gifted by Dae. I did not expect this to be so glittery. I would have preferred the product without glitter since this is a wash out product anyways, but I did like how glossy and soft it made my hair feel. I left it on for about 20 minutes before washing my hair and carefully rinsed everything out to wash out all the glitter.

I rechecked this complimentary from dae

reviews.review_title: Beautiful product for all hair types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Dae Hair Stargloss Hair Shine Treatment, and I must say, it was an experience that exceeded my expectations. As someone with fine, thin, long hair, I'm always on the lookout for products that can give my hair a boost of shine and vitality. Here's my review based on my personal experience with the product:  II left the product in my hair for about 90 minutes before washing it out. The wait time allowed the treatment to work its magic. During this time, I couldn't help but admire the beautiful glitter in the product. It added a touch of whimsy and provoked a childlike excitement in me. It's not often that hair treatments are visually captivating, and this unique aspect of the Stargloss treatment made the experience even more enjoyable.  After rinsing out the product and washing my hair, I immediately noticed a difference in the texture of my hair. It felt remarkably softer than usual, which was a delightful surprise. The treatment seemed to have provided deep hydration and nourishment to my strands, leaving them feeling incredibly smooth and supple.  The true test of any hair treatment lies in its ability to deliver long-lasting shine, and in this regard, the Dae Hair Stargloss Treatment did not disappoint. Once my hair was completely dry, I couldn't help but marvel at the mirror-like shine it had acquired. The treatment had breathed new life into my hair, making it appear healthier, lustrous, and more vibrant than ever before.  One aspect worth mentioning is that the Stargloss Hair Shine Treatment doesn't weigh down fine or thin hair. Instead, it manages to add volume and body while providing the desired shine. This was a significant relief for me, as many shine-enhancing products tend to leave my hair looking flat and lifeless. The Stargloss Treatment strikes the perfect balance, making it suitable for various hair types. This product was gifted to me by Dae hair for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous! I love a shiny healthy hair vibe and this gloss Gifted by Dae is perfect! It not only smells very good for summer but it leaves my hair soft, shiny and not tacky or weighed down.  Always a plus in the hot summer heat

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried dae hair products before but have always seen and heard raving reviews about them. I was so excited to try their new star gloss hair shine treatment. I have dry hair and this definitely gave it some shine even after one use. I applied it to my hair according to the directions and let it set for a couple hours. Next time Im going to try overnight. After washing it out my hair felt silky and smooth and so shiny. I blow dried it and wow it has never looked so good after. Cant wait to keep using it. Gifted by dae.

reviews.review_title: Add a gloss to your haircare routine ASAP!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Dae Hair- I have used the glaze gloss before trying this gloss, and have loved adding a gloss to my haircare routine. I have thick, black hair that has the tendency to become dry and dull/ hard to manage. This product has instructions to leave it on for at least 20 mins, or overnight- I put it on before bed and showered in the morning using my OUAI thick hair shampoo and conditioner. My hair was super soft and shiny! The product smells amazing- and also unexpectedly has literal glitter in it which is so cute and fun! I didnt have issues washing it off at all. Also Daes packaging and ingredients are so nice and well thought out. I havent used this brand before, but am really happy with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Dae Hair. I leave the Stargloss Hair Shine Treatment on for around 20 minutes. After washing out the product from my hair, it feels nourished and hydrated. I like the fresh and fruity scent and my hair looks very smooth plus shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Dae. Wow wow wow. The scent, the packaging, the results! I love a mask I can use before washing and that I can leave on overnight. I wash my hair once weekly and this is my favorite to use the night before washing.
